name: MARTIAN CONQUER
description:
Martian Conquer is a ship battle game. In which the player takes control of the martian empire. Your goal is very simple. launch an invasion in earth
In this game i make a mix of turn based strategy and classic space shooter game.
The player will lead a Martian Fleet and bring an earth invasion


  • Main campaign with a mix of turn based strategy and space shooter.
  • Five mini missions with specific objectives
  • Arcade mode in which you must defeat bosses and pass levels
